title: What are the courses offered in distance learning from IGNOU? - Quora

response.answer_text: Firstly I remember you that IGNOU is an central University. It's offer number of course from short-term certificate to or master degree, PhD level courses from IGNOU. I studied at IGNOU since 2012 to 2016 and I'm completed my diploma in mechanical engineering and bachelor degree in public administration as a major subject. Most of courses offered by IGNOU are distance mode . Please see their prospecter because sometimes they offer some new course and some closed. As per opinion IGNOU is an best university for those who have enable to studied regular education . Campus recruitment in every year and they informed thourgh your register mobile number and mail id.
a lot more cources are there in ignou like http://b.comhttp://m.combcamcamscmaphdbedmswand many more… i suggest you plz visit ignou.ac.in . and you can easily know more about it.
